name: Pride DD26 Demo
description:
This is the second demo for Pride. Thanks for playing, I hope you like it!!

There's a readme file with all of the controls/console commands/misc info.

Info:
Swords are a checkpoint.
Enemies drop pride when they die.  It's used as currency.
When you die you drop your pride. If you die again without picking it up, it's lost forever.
Ranged weapon reserves refill naturally with your magic pockets, so don't sweat throwin a bunch!
Dodging gives you invincibility frames, but only while the dodge animation is playing!
The deviant's slingshot is used by holding down space to charge your shot. There's a leeway period directly after a shot where you can still control the bomb's orientation.
Some smaller enemies have a chance to dodge your attacks. This chance will decrease and scale with the "accuracy" stat, no matter your class.
There are hidden areas, and even a hidden (unfinished) boss fight!
There's a whole bunch of unfinished content/bugs. I also wasn't able to finish the boss fight music in time. Sorry about that.
